COMMAND.name: jdbccommand
COMMAND.COMMENT: This command contains all operations supported on a JDBC database connection.

OPERATION.name: SaveJournalEntry
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation inserts a journal entry into the database.

OPERATION.name: SelectIDDIInfo
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a list ofEmployees from a jdbc database, given a first and last name.

OPERATION.name: SaveBillPayTransaction
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation saves the bill pay details into the database.

OPERATION.name: SelectIDDIData
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a list ofEmployees from a jdbc database, given a first and last name.

OPERATION.name: SaveIDDIVersion
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation inserts or updates the dataset version into the database.

OPERATION.name: SaveIDDIRegisterVersion
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation inserts or updates the dataset version into the database.

OPERATION.name: ReadAllDataSets
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads dataset information for all datasets.

OPERATION.name: ReadJournalKeys
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads a list of keys from the database for journal entries that match a given set of criteria.

OPERATION.name: ReadJournalEntry
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads a specific journal entry from the database.

OPERATION.name: ReadSupplyCategoryOperation
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a list of supply categories from a jdbc database, given a string lookup store and category and searchString (SupplyItemSearchCriteria).

OPERATION.name: ReadSupplyItemOperation
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a list of Supply Items from the jdbc database. The data returned is based on the criteria identified in the SupplyItemSearchCriteria object. Supply items can be located by Store, Store and Category or Store and Item Description.

OPERATION.name: SaveSupplyOrderOperation
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation saves a SupplyOrder containing SupplyOrderLineItems to the jdbc database.

OPERATION.name: ReadAssociateTotals
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a priced item from a jdbc database, given a string lookup key.

OPERATION.name: SaveAssociateProductivity
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a priced item from a jdbc database, given a string lookup key.

OPERATION.name: PLULookup
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a priced item from a jdbc database, given a string lookup key.

OPERATION.name: SCLULookup
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a Store Coupon PLUItem from a jdbc database, given a string lookup key.

OPERATION.name: ReadServiceItems
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves all service items from a jdbc database.

OPERATION.name: ReadItemInfo
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves item information from jdbc database.

OPERATION.name: ReadDepartmentList
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a department by name or ID.

OPERATION.name: employeelookup
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves an Employee from a jdbc database, given a string loginID.

OPERATION.name: SelectEmployees
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a list ofEmployees from a jdbc database, given a first and last name.

OPERATION.name: UpdateEmployee
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves an Employee from a jdbc database, given a string loginID.

OPERATION.name: insertEmployee
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves an Employee from a jdbc database, given a string loginID.

OPERATION.name: GenerateEmployeeID
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation generates a new employee ID.

OPERATION.name: SaveCustomer
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation saves a Customer.

OPERATION.name: SaveIRSCustomer
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation saves an IRS Customer.

OPERATION.name: ReadScanSheet
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves all scan sheet items from a jdbc database.

OPERATION.name: ReadPasswordPolicy
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads Password Policy and its criertia.

OPERATION.name: UpdateEmployeeNumberFailedAttempts
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation updates EmployeeNumberFailedAttempts.

OPERATION.name: ReadPasswordHistory
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads Password History.

OPERATION.name: SavePasswordHistory
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation inserts Password History.

OPERATION.name: ReadCustomer
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a Customer.

OPERATION.name: ReadPricingGroup
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a Customer pricing Group.

OPERATION.name: ReadCustomerbyTaxID
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves Customers on the basis of Tax ID.

OPERATION.name: UpdateCustomerSequenceNumber
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation update customer sequence number.

OPERATION.name: GetLastTrainingCustomerSequenceNumber
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves the last transaction sequence number for training mode.

OPERATION.name: UpdateCustomerBatchIDs
OPERATION.COMMENT: Updates transactions with the t-log batch identifier.

OPERATION.name: RetrieveCustomerIDsByBatchID
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads customer IDs by their batch identifier.

OPERATION.name: ReadCustomerDataReplicationEntity
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves all transactions available for data replication.

OPERATION.name: ReadCustomerbyEmail
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a Customer.

OPERATION.name: SelectCustomers
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a list of Customers that match some criteria.

OPERATION.name: ReadCustomerbyEmployee
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a Customer.

OPERATION.name: WriteCaptureCustomer
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation writes captured customer information caught during a transaction to the capture customer table.

OPERATION.name: UpdateReturnedLineItems
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves the next sequence number based on store id, business day date, and workstation id.

OPERATION.name: UpdateVoidedReturnedLineItems
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves the next sequence number based on store id, business day date, and workstation id.

OPERATION.name: UpdatePriceAdjustedLineItems
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation updates a price adjusted line item.

OPERATION.name: IsTransactionVoided
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation check to see if a transaction has been voided based on store id, business day date, transaction sequence number and workstation id.

OPERATION.name: ReadTransaction
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a transaction based on store id, business day date, workstation id, and transaction sequence number.

OPERATION.name: ReadOrderLineItemStatus
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves order line item status based on store id, business day date, workstation id, transaction sequence number and line item sequence number.

OPERATION.name: ReadDepartment
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a department by name or ID.

OPERATION.name: ReadTransactionHistory
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a list of transactions based on a customer ID.

OPERATION.name: ReadTransactionListByStatus
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a list of transactions based on store, business date and status.

OPERATION.name: ReadBillPayments
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a list of bills paid based on start date and currenct date.

OPERATION.name: UpdateTransactionStatus
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation updates the transaction status.

OPERATION.name: CancelSuspendedTransactions
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation cancels all suspended transactions for a specified store and business date.

OPERATION.name: ReadTransactionsByID
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a list of transactions based on a transaction ID and optional date range.

OPERATION.name: GetLastTrainingTransactionSequenceNumber
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves the last transaction sequence number for training mode.

OPERATION.name: SaveRetailTransaction
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation saves a SaleReturnTransaction.

OPERATION.name: SaveCanceledTransaction
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation saves a Canceled Transaction.

OPERATION.name: SaveInstantCreditTransaction
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation saves an Instant Credit Enrollment Transaction.

OPERATION.name: SaveVoidTransaction
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation saves a VoidTransaction.

OPERATION.name: SaveNoSaleTransaction
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation saves a NoSaleTransaction.

OPERATION.name: SaveEnterExitTrainingModeTransaction
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation saves a NoSaleTransaction.

OPERATION.name: SaveControlTransaction
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation saves a ControlTransaction.

OPERATION.name: SaveRetailTransactionLineItems
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation saves all line items associated with the transaction.

OPERATION.name: SaveOrderLineItems
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation saves all order line items associated with the transaction.

OPERATION.name: SaveTenderLineItems
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation saves all tender line items associated with the transaction.

OPERATION.name: ReadStoreTotals
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation returns the totals for a store

OPERATION.name: ReadStoreStatus
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation returns the status for a store

OPERATION.name: ReadStoreStatuses
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation returns the open-business-date statuses for a store

OPERATION.name: RefreshStoreStatus
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation refreshes the status information for a store for a particular business date.

OPERATION.name: CreateStoreTotals
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation creates the totals for a store

OPERATION.name: UpdateStoreStatus
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation updates the status for a store

OPERATION.name: AddStoreTotals
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation updates the financial totals for a store

OPERATION.name: ReadStoreRegisters
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads all of a stores registers for a particular business day.

OPERATION.name: ReadRegisterTotals
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads the register information

OPERATION.name: ReadAllStoreRegisterStatus
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads the current status of a register

OPERATION.name: ReadAllStoreRegisterSummaryStatus
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads the current SummaryStatus of a register

OPERATION.name: ReadRegisterStatus
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads the current status of a register

OPERATION.name: CreateRegisterStatus
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation creates the status portions of a register

OPERATION.name: UpdateRegisterStatus
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation updates the status portions of a register

OPERATION.name: UpdateRegisterTotals
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation updates the financial totals of a register

OPERATION.name: AddRegisterTotals
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation adds to the financial totals of a register

OPERATION.name: ReadTillTotals
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads the till information

OPERATION.name: SaveTaxHistory
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation save the tax totals

OPERATION.name: ReadTillStatus
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads the current status of a till

OPERATION.name: CreateTillTotals
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation creates the till financial totals

OPERATION.name: CreateTillStatus
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation creates the till

OPERATION.name: UpdateTillTotals
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation updates the till financial totals

OPERATION.name: UpdateTillStatus
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation updates the till status information

OPERATION.name: ReadReportingPeriod
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads a list of reporting periods

OPERATION.name: ReadDepartmentTotals
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads the department financial information

OPERATION.name: AddDepartmentTotals
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation saves the department financial information

OPERATION.name: ReadTimeIntervalTotals
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads the workstation time activity information

OPERATION.name: AddTimeIntervalTotals
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation saves the workstation time activity information

OPERATION.name: InsertRole
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation performs INSERT operations

OPERATION.name: UpdateRole
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation performs UPDATE operations

OPERATION.name: ReadRoles
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation performs SELECT statements

OPERATION.name: ReadRoleFunctions
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation performs SELECT statements

OPERATION.name: RetrieveOrder
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves order(s)

OPERATION.name: RetrieveOrderSummaryByStatus
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves order summary(s)

OPERATION.name: RetrieveOrderSummaryByOrderID
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves order summary(s)

OPERATION.name: RetrieveOrderSummaryByCustomer
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves order summary(s)

OPERATION.name: UpdateOrderStatus
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation updates an order status based upon an order.

OPERATION.name: UpdateOrder
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation updates an order status based upon an order.

OPERATION.name: RetrieveEMessage
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves an EMessage.

OPERATION.name: RetrieveEMessagesByStatus
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves EMessage(s).

OPERATION.name: RetrieveEMessagesByCustomer
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves EMessage(s).

OPERATION.name: RetrieveEMessagesByOrderID
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves EMessage(s).

OPERATION.name: SendEMessage
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation sends an EMessage.

OPERATION.name: UpdateEMessage
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation updates an EMessage.

OPERATION.name: UpdateEMessageStatus
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation updates the status of an EMessage.

OPERATION.name: RetrieveAlertList
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieve and alertList.

OPERATION.name: ReadCurrencyType
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads a currency type by country code.

OPERATION.name: ReadCurrencyTypeList
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads a currency list.

OPERATION.name: SelectCustomerGroups
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves the available customer groups.

OPERATION.name: UpdatePosIdentity
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation updates the POS identity table by item ID.

OPERATION.name: ListPriceMaintenance
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation finds events based on a search criteria.

OPERATION.name: IncrementWorkstationSequenceNumber
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves the next sequence number based on store id, and workstation id.

OPERATION.name: ReadLayaway
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a layaway by ID.

OPERATION.name: ReadLayawayPaymentHistoryInfo
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves layaway payment history info.

OPERATION.name: ReadLayawayTenders
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves all the tenders applied to the layaway

OPERATION.name: ReadLayawaysByCustomerID
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a layaway by ID.

OPERATION.name: ReadLayawayDescriptions
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a description of the first line item for a group of layaways.

OPERATION.name: ReadLayawayDescription
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a description of the first line item for a single layaway.

OPERATION.name: ReadLayawayTransactionStatus
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves the status of a single layaway.

OPERATION.name: UpdateLayaway
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation updates a layaway by ID.

OPERATION.name: UpdateLayawayForPayment
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation updates a layaway by ID after a type_layaway_payment is made.

OPERATION.name: InsertLayaway
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation inserts a layaway.

OPERATION.name: InsertPayment
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation inserts a payment.

OPERATION.name: SaveLayawayPaymentHistoryInfo
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation inserts updates layaway payment history info used for patriot act.

OPERATION.name: SaveTenderMediaLineItems
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation saves the tender media line items associated with a count.

OPERATION.name: ReadWorkstationIDsByStore
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads all workstation IDs for a store.

OPERATION.name: RetrieveTransactionIDsByBatchID
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads transaction IDs by their batch identifier.

OPERATION.name: RetrieveTransactionIDsByBusinessDate
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads transaction IDs for a specific business date.

OPERATION.name: RetrieveTransactionIDsByTimePeriod
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads transaction IDs for a specific time period.

OPERATION.name: ReadTransactionForBatch
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads a transaction for batch processing.

OPERATION.name: SaveStoreOpenCloseTransaction
OPERATION.COMMENT: Saves a store open/close transaction.

OPERATION.name: UpdateSafeFromStoreOpenCloseTransaction
OPERATION.COMMENT: Updates the store safe using data in a StoreOpenCloseTransaction.

OPERATION.name: SaveStoreOpenCloseSafeTenderMedia
OPERATION.COMMENT: Writes the tender media data for the safe transactions on a StoreOpenCloseTransaction.

OPERATION.name: SaveRegisterOpenCloseTransaction
OPERATION.COMMENT: Saves a register open/close transaction.

OPERATION.name: CreateUpdateTill
OPERATION.COMMENT: Creates or updates a till status record as needed.

OPERATION.name: CreateUpdateTillTotals
OPERATION.COMMENT: Creates or updates till totals as needed.

OPERATION.name: SaveTillOpenCloseTransaction
OPERATION.COMMENT: Saves a till open/close transaction.

OPERATION.name: UpdateSafeFromTillOpenCloseTransaction
OPERATION.COMMENT: Updates the store safe using data in a TillOpenCloseTransaction.

OPERATION.name: UpdateSafeFromBankDepositTransaction
OPERATION.COMMENT: Updates the store safe using data in a BankDepositTransaction.

OPERATION.name: SaveBankDepositSafeTenderMedia
OPERATION.COMMENT: Writes the tender media data for the safe transactions on a BankDepositTransaction.

OPERATION.name: UpdateTransactionBatchIDs
OPERATION.COMMENT: Updates transactions with the t-log batch identifier.

OPERATION.name: UpdateTransactionTLogIDs
OPERATION.COMMENT: Updates transactions with the t-log batch identifier.

OPERATION.name: MarkInventoryReservationOrderList
OPERATION.COMMENT: Updates transactions with the inventory reservation batch identifier.

OPERATION.name: UpdateTransactionRTLogIDs
OPERATION.COMMENT: Updates transactions with the RTlog batch identifier.

OPERATION.name: IncrementRTLogBatchCount
OPERATION.COMMENT: Updates transactions with the RTlog batch identifier.

OPERATION.name: SaveIXRetailTransaction
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a priced item from a jdbc database, given a string lookup key.

OPERATION.name: ReadNewTaxRules
OPERATION.COMMENT: New for 7.0, replaces previous 2 classes (ReadTaxRules, ReadTaxRulesByPostalCode)

OPERATION.name: LookupBusiness
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves business customers by business info.

OPERATION.name: ExecuteSQL
OPERATION.COMMENT: Executes user defined SQL statements.

OPERATION.name: PurgeAgedData
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves a priced item from a jdbc database, given a string lookup key.

OPERATION.name: ReadStoreTills
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads all of a store's tills for a particular business day.

OPERATION.name: DeAssociateMerchandiseHierarchyGroups
OPERATION.COMMENT: Removes an the association between an existing merchandise classification hierarchy group as a child of another existing merchandise hierarchy classification group. If the child is no-longer associated with any parent group, in any hierarchy then it is removed.

OPERATION.name: AssociateMerchandiseHierarchyGroups
OPERATION.COMMENT: Associates an existing merchandise classification hierarchy group as a child of another existing merchandise hierarchy classification group.

OPERATION.name: FetchMerchandiseHierarchyGroupItemIDs
OPERATION.COMMENT: Fetches the IDs for the set of Items that're assigned to the merchandise classification hierarchy group (and it's children groups) from the MerchandiseHierarchy tables in the ARTS data model (Release 4.0).

OPERATION.name: FetchMerchandiseHierarchyLevelGroups
OPERATION.COMMENT: Fetches the levles for the given merchandise classification hierarchy from the MerchandiseHierarchy tables in the ARTS data model (Release 4.0).

OPERATION.name: FetchChildrenMerchandiseHierarchyGroupIDs
OPERATION.COMMENT: Fetches the definitions for the set of child merchandise classification hierarchy group ids that're chilren of a particular group in the MerchandiseHierarchy tables of the ARTS data model (Release 4.0).

OPERATION.name: FetchAllLevelItems
OPERATION.COMMENT: Fetches the ItemDetails for the set of Items that're assigned to the merchandise classification hierarchy group (and it's children groups) from the MerchandiseHierarchy tables in the ARTS data model (Release 4.0).

OPERATION.name: ReadStoreInfo
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation returns the totals for a store

OPERATION.name: FetchItemPriceInfo
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation fetches items actual price and promotion end date

OPERATION.name: CreateCalendar
OPERATION.COMMENT: Creates a new BusinessCalendar as defined in the Calendar tables in the ARTS data model (Release 4.0)

OPERATION.name: FetchCalendarByID
OPERATION.COMMENT: Fetches a pre-existing BusinessCalendar from the Calendar tables in the ARTS data model (Release 4.0) - using internal ID.

OPERATION.name: FetchCalendarByName
OPERATION.COMMENT: Fetches a pre-existing BusinessCalendar from the Calendar tables in the ARTS data model (Release 4.0) - using external name.

OPERATION.name: RemoveCalendar
OPERATION.COMMENT: Removes an existing BusinessCalendar from the Calendar tables in the ARTS data model (Release 4.0)

OPERATION.name: WriteCalendar
OPERATION.COMMENT: Updates an existing BusinessCalendar in the Calendar tables in the ARTS data model (Release 4.0)

OPERATION.name: CreateCalendarLevel
OPERATION.COMMENT: Creates a new BusinessCalendar as defined in the Calendar tables in the ARTS data model (Release 4.0)

OPERATION.name: RemoveCalendarLevel
OPERATION.COMMENT: Removes an existing BusinessCalendar from the Calendar tables in the ARTS data model (Release 4.0)

OPERATION.name: WriteCalendarLevel
OPERATION.COMMENT: Updates an existing BusinessCalendar in the Calendar tables in the ARTS data model (Release 4.0)

OPERATION.name: AssociateCalendarLevels
OPERATION.COMMENT: Two pre-existing calendarLevels in the calendar tables are now parent & child.

OPERATION.name: DeAssociateCalendarLevels
OPERATION.COMMENT: A parent & child pair of calendarLevels in the calendar tables are no longer parent & child.

OPERATION.name: CreateCalendarPeriod
OPERATION.COMMENT: Create a single Period in the calendar structures in the database.

OPERATION.name: FetchSingleCalendarPeriod
OPERATION.COMMENT: Fetch a single Period from the calendar structures in the database.

OPERATION.name: RemoveCalendarPeriod
OPERATION.COMMENT: Remove a particular Period from the calendar structures of the database.

OPERATION.name: FetchAllCalendarPeriodsContainingDate
OPERATION.COMMENT: Fetch one or more Periods from the calendar structures of the database that contain the given date.

OPERATION.name: FetchAllCalendarPeriodsInLevel
OPERATION.COMMENT: Fetch one or more Periods from the calendar structures of the database that are in the given level

OPERATION.name: FetchAllCalendarPeriodsInLevelContainingDate
OPERATION.COMMENT: Fetch one or more Periods from the calendar structures of the database that are in the given level and contain the given date.

OPERATION.name: FetchAllChildrenCalendarPeriods
OPERATION.COMMENT: Fetch one or more Periods from the calendar structures of the database that are children of the given period.

OPERATION.name: FetchAllChildrenCalendarPeriodsInLevel
OPERATION.COMMENT: Fetch one or more Periods from the calendar structures of the database that are children of the given period and are in the given level.

OPERATION.name: FetchAllParentCalendarPeriods
OPERATION.COMMENT: Fetch one or more Periods from the calendar structures of the database that are parents of the given period.

OPERATION.name: FetchAllParentCalendarPeriodsInLevel
OPERATION.COMMENT: Fetch one or more Periods from the calendar structures of the database that are parents of the given period and are in the given level.

OPERATION.name: AssociateCalendarPeriods
OPERATION.COMMENT: Two pre-existing calendarPeriods in the calendar tables are now parent & child.

OPERATION.name: DeAssociateCalendarPeriods
OPERATION.COMMENT: A parent & child pair of calendarPeriods in the calendar tables are no longer parent & child.

OPERATION.name: CloseCalendarPeriod
OPERATION.COMMENT: An open CalendarPeriod in the database is now closed.

OPERATION.name: FetchAllReportingPeriodIDsBetweenDates
OPERATION.COMMENT: Fetch one or more Reporting Period IDs from the calendar structures of the database - that fall (completely or partially) into a period of time denoted by the given dates.

OPERATION.name: FetchAllReportingPeriodIDsContainingDate
OPERATION.COMMENT: Fetch one or more Reporting Period IDs from the calendar structures of the database - that contain the given Date.

OPERATION.name: FetchAllReportingPeriodIDsInLevel
OPERATION.COMMENT: Fetch one or more Reporting Period IDs from the calendar structures of the database - that are in the given CalendarLevel.

OPERATION.name: FetchAllReportingPeriodIDsInLevelContainingDate
OPERATION.COMMENT: Fetch one or more Reporting Period IDs from the calendar structures of the database - that are in the given CalendarLevel AND contain the given date.

OPERATION.name: SaveParameters
OPERATION.COMMENT: Writes the updated register settings to the appropriate registers.

OPERATION.name: SaveTillStartingFloat
OPERATION.COMMENT: Saves the starting float for the till

OPERATION.name: LookupCertificate
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation looks up a certificate.

OPERATION.name: LookupStoreCredit
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation looks up a store credit.

OPERATION.name: LookupRedeemedTender
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation looks up a redeemed tender.

OPERATION.name: ReadItemSizes
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation looks up all the size codes.

OPERATION.name: ReadTaxHistory
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads tax history.

OPERATION.name: ReadDataReplicationEntity
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves all transactions available for data replication.

OPERATION.name: ReadRegionDistrict
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves the store information for the given store ID.

OPERATION.name: ReadSafeTenders
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation retrieves the safe tenders.

OPERATION.name: ReadGiftCertificateIssued
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation gift certificate for the given certificate number.

OPERATION.name: StoreCreditUniqueCheck
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation searches for a store credit that has been issued.

OPERATION.name: ReadCodeList
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads a specific code list.

OPERATION.name: ReadCodeListDepartment
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads a code list for Department

OPERATION.name: ReadCodeListShippingMethod
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads a code list for Shipping Method

OPERATION.name: ReadCodeListDiscount
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads a code list for Manual Discounts

OPERATION.name: ReadCodeListUnitOfMeasure
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads a code list for Unit Of Measure

OPERATION.name: SaveLocalizedCodeList
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads a specific code list.

OPERATION.name: SaveLocalizedCodeListDiscount
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads a specific code list.

OPERATION.name: SaveLocalizedCodeListUOM
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads a specific code list.

OPERATION.name: SaveLocalizedCodeListDepartment
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads a specific code list.

OPERATION.name: ReadItemStyles
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads item styles

OPERATION.name: ReadItemTypes
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads item types

OPERATION.name: ReadItemColors
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation reads item colors

OPERATION.name: UpdateTransactionExternalOrder
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation updates external order transaction records with ids for line items added to an external order.

OPERATION.name: SaveRetailTransactionDocument
OPERATION.COMMENT: This operation save any legal document like an external order contract that is associated with the transaction
